mapper.select: SELECT tg.gosu_number, question_number, tu.user_number, question_title, question_content, question_date, question_viewcnt, question_status, last_update FROM tbl_question tq join tbl_user tu join tbl_gosu tg on tq.user_number = tu.user_number where tg.gosu_number = tq.gosu_number and tg.gosu_number=#{gosuNumber} order by question_date asc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_question(question_title, question_content, gosu_number, user_number, question_status, question_date, last_update, question_viewcnt) values(#{questionTitle},#{questionContent}, #{gosuNumber}, #{userNumber}, 0, now(), now(), 0)
mapper.select: SELECT user_nickname FROM tbl_user tu join tbl_gosu tg ON tu.user_number = tg.user_number WHERE tg.gosu_number = #{gosuNumber}

select question_number, question_title, question_content, question_date, tu.user_nickname, tq.question_viewcnt from tbl_user tu join tbl_question tq on question_number=#{questionNumber} and tu.user_number = tq.user_number

select tq.question_number, tq.question_title, tqf.file_system_name from tbl_gosu tg left join tbl_question tq on tg.gosu_number = tq.gosu_number left join tbl_question_file tqf on tq.question_number =tqf.question_number where tg.gosu_number = #{gosuNumber} and tq.question_status=#{questionStatus} order by tq.last_update desc
select tu.user_nickname, tg.gosu_number from tbl_user tu join tbl_gosu tg on tu.user_number = tg.user_number where tg.gosu_number = #{gosuNumber}

select tq.question_number, tq.question_title, date_format(tq.question_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as question_date, tu.user_nickname, tuf.file_system_name from tbl_gosu tg left join tbl_question tq on tg.gosu_number = tq.gosu_number left join tbl_user tu on tq.user_number = tu.user_number left join tbl_user_file tuf on tu.user_number = tuf.user_number where tg.gosu_number = ${gosuNumber}
and tq.question_status = 0
and tq.question_status = 1
order by question_number desc
